name: Damn Ropes - Prototype Demo
description:
Damn Ropes    is an Action Platformer where you play as the Robot 'Bitty' and try to rescue your friend 'Bytti'.

You'r only movement abilities are jumping and using your Laser Rope. Only the ones with the best reflexes and skills can make it! (That's not accurate for the demo. Wait till the game releases)

The game is in active development and we want to improve it as much as possible with your feedback! Contact us on Twitter, Patron or Itch.io.
